channel.title: Travel Recovery on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Travel Recovery on FinanClub

item.title: LUV
item.description: score:1027 Chances: Southwest Airlines is extending its flight schedule through April 8, 2024, offering more nonstop options for customers, particularly during peak travel times. The denial of a Southwest pilot strike request by the National Mediation Board reduces the likelihood of a strike, allowing negotiations to resume next week.
